title: Meeniyan Junior CFA
brief_description: The next generation of fire fighters start young. In an effort to encourage the young people of Meeniyan to become senior CFA members, the Meeniyan Junior CFA creates an atmosphere of fun and friendship while teaching kids the basics of fire fighting.
